title: New: Polar Dear – Thanatos
body:
After being the first website to pick up on Budapest’s electro-pop duo **Polar Dear**, it’s great to hear them back with a new song in the form of _Thanatos_.

Again, it’s synth heavy and wonderfully danceable, part **Hot Chip**, part **Bloc Party**; surely it’s only a matter of time before more people pick up on **Oleg Borsos** and **Mark Lechner**. Allow their debut track [_Even If I’m Late_](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/11318-introducing-polar-dear/) and new cut _Thanatos_ to flow into each and other, and become truly immersed in the infectious sound of **Polar Dear**.
